answerText: separation of variables[10] According to the Cauchy-Lipschitz theorem, for some differential equation defined over a space that is Lipschitz continuous, there will exist a solution to the differential equation that will have this property.

question: Question: For the differential equation "dy over dx equals f of x times g of y," this method would entail multiplying both sides by dx and dividing both by sides by "g of y" then integrating. For 10 points each: [10] Name this rather simple method of solving differential equations, which is sometimes named after Fourier.
